Module com.example.anti_cafe
Package com.example.anti_cafe

Class TableCloseWindow

java.lang.Object
javafx.application.Application
com.example.anti_cafe.MainWindow
com.example.anti_cafe.TableCloseWindow
All Implemented Interfaces:
ActionForButtonCloseTable
Direct Known Subclasses:
ArchiveWindow
public class TableCloseWindow extends MainWindow implements ActionForButtonCloseTable
Class for the table close window, allowing users to release tables and manage their status and usage statistics.

  • Nested Class Summary

  • Method Details

    • ensureTableIsOccupied

      private static void ensureTableIsOccupied​(int tableIndex) throws TableOccupiedException
      Checks if the table is occupied. If the table is free, throws an exception.
      Parameters:
      tableIndex - index of the table to check
      Throws:
      TableOccupiedException - if the table is free

    • displayErrorMessage

      Parameters:
      exception - an exception containing error information
